message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase a unique product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential return on investment for you.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and would allow me to get a better return on investment.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is below its true value. I'm willing to negotiate and can come down to $1,350,000. This offer reflects my desire to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1,350,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and my investment goals.
